attr.title: MEGA MAN Witter's Domination
attr.desc: An action platformer fangame where you run, shoot, jump, slide and collect special weapon after defeating bosses known as Robot Masters. There are 2 playable characters - Megaman, a robot using mostly ranged weapons and a close combat fighter named Slizer who is learning various abilities. Also you can find a secret challenge on each level that rewards with some form of boost.
attr.inst: Download Free at itch.io https://slash7.itch.io/megaman-witters-domination and place the Mega Man Witter Domination.zip into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download Free at [itch.io](https://slash7.itch.io/megaman-witters-domination) and place the Mega Man Witter Domination.zip into the assets folder.
